The claim originated from a known fake n: TheNewYorkEvening.com, which has a history of publishing false stories.
The claim was flagged by Facebook users: indicating that it was recognized as unreliable by the social media community.
The post mentioned details that were fac: such as the existence of a Harvard chancellor named Malcolm Little (Harvard has a president, not a chancellor) and the Obama family considering a discrimination suit.
The source of the claim: TheLastLineOfDefense.org, is a parody website known for fabricating stories to inflame conservatives and does not clearly indicate that its articles are satirical.
